job_description: Analyst, Import/Export (Fresh Graduates) 2024 Global import-export in the world of ground-breaking technology is a complicated business. It takes real attention to detail to comply with all U.S. and regional import and export regulations. Our Import-Export team within Materials and Procurement provides trade compliance support for end-to-end order management and delivery processes. We’re experts in what we do, from assessing global trade risk and providing mitigation strategies, to delivering strategic and tactical support in developing international supply chains, to implementing strategies to reduce import expenses and auditing all documentation. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Trade Compliance Analyst on our Import/Export Team in Bukit Metajam, Penang. What you’ll achieve As a Trade Compliance Analyst , you will be responsible to works under direction to assist with standard import/export processes and procedures. You will be able to influence Dell’s future policies on managing trade compliance at a country, regional & global level. You will have a chance to obtain global content knowledge by leveraging content experts on country-specific requirements and its practical applications. You will: Works under direction to assist with standard import/export processes and procedures Assists in communication/discussions with the freight forwarder/customers broker Supports small to medium sized projects to help implement continuous improvement processes and policies With guided supervision, helps to maintain the companies Foreign trade data Assists with export compliance, export licensing and order screening Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Bachelor's Degree in Law, Supply Chain, logistics or any related field Good knowledge of import and export requirements Has basic knowledge of international trade, operation and compliance Determined and driven, has good communication skills Desirable Requirements Thai language is a plus Knowledge of basic analytical tools (Excel, Power BI) Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
